name: Miele
0:
”Alexa, start the vacuum on turbo.”
”Alexa, turn on fridge-freezer super cooling.”
”Alexa, turn hood cooking light on.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: miele
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Miele. Immer besser.

Miele speaks the language of the smart homes of the future: meet the next generation of our Miele Skill, which supports intelligent voice assistance for your appliances. You can benefit from many improved functions for controlling your appliances. Connecting your accounts has never been easier. Our new App-to-App Account Linking can be found either in the Miele App or in the Miele Scout App in the Smart Features tab. If you have already downloaded the Miele App, you are able to transfer your login details by simply clicking on “connect Miele Account”.


It’s now also easy for you to change the colors of your Aura 4 or Pearl range hood using the Alexa Smart Home function without having to mention Miele. For example, say: “Alexa, change the range hood color to red.”

You can also set the new booster level 2 on the range hood using your voice. Try it out and say: “Alexa, set the range hood to booster level 2.” 

Can’t hear Alexa over the noise? By saying “Repeat that.” you can have the last response repeated for you.




Appliance search

To control appliances using smart home commands, first add them using the appliance search function in the Alexa app or say: “Alexa, find my appliances”. Now all of your appliances added to your Miele@home account can be viewed automatically using Amazon Alexa. Just connect your Amazon Alexa account to your Miele@home account to do this. 

Please also follow the installation instructions provided below. 


Routines

Your routines are as unique as you are.

Sit back and allow your smart Miele appliances to do the rest – they can now be seamlessly integrated into your routines in the Alexa app. Give your creativity free rein. Start functions when you leave home, before you return at the end of the day, or after enjoying dinner with family and friends – you decide exactly when and how they all work.


Functions

The Miele Smart Home Skill enables you to control your appliances in next to no time.
 
The following control options are available*:

– Switching on/off (washing machine, tumble dryer, washer-dryer, dishwasher, oven, steam oven, microwave, combi-steam oven, robot vacuum cleaner, coffee machine, ventilation hood, Gourmet drawer)
– Ventilation stages (ventilation hood)
– Reading the temperature (refrigerator, freezer, bottom-mount unit, Dialog Oven, oven, speed oven, steam oven, combi-steam oven, steam oven with microwave, wine storage unit, wine conditioning unit, wine storage and conditioning unit, Gourmet drawer)
– SuperCool (refrigerator or bottom-mount unit)
– SuperFrost (freezer or bottom-mount unit)
– “Turbo”, “Silent”, “Spot”, and “Auto” cleaning programs (Miele Scout robot vacuum cleaner)
– Switching on the lighting (cooktop lighting on the ventilation hood)

 
Installation

Activate the skill, add your appliances, and you’re ready to go: all you need is a Miele@home account and the Miele App or the Miele Scout App for the robot vacuum cleaner (both apps are available from the app store of your smartphone’s operating system). You can set up your account either at www.miele.com or directly in the Miele App. Then simply link your account in the Alexa app to enjoy all the skill’s benefits! 
Please also follow the appliance search instructions provided above.

We hope you enjoy using the Miele Smart Home Skill!

Your Miele Voice Team

---

Notes:

We would like to inform you that it may not be possible to access all the functions of the Miele App with the Miele Smart Home Skill. 
*Please also note that not every smart appliance is currently able to call up the listed functions.

We are constantly optimizing the skill and developing new features and functions for you to use. How satisfied are you with our skill? Please rate it here. You can find answers to frequently asked questions and more information here: https://www.mieleusa.com/support/customer-assistance/voice_assistant-1330/amazon_alexa | info@mieleusa.com | +1 888 99 64353
